lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
«Kai gar evoulonto myanai tin gin taftin
Mi gignoskontes tin yvrin, in epoioun…»
Eicha mia periousia, tin katachrastikane
Kanan ierosylia ki oute pou ntrapikane
Tin istoria tis zois mou de skeftikane
Poia prosefchi ego na kano gia ta krimata tous
Poia prosefchi boro na po gia na sothoun
Stazo krasi gia na xeplyno t’ amartimata tous
Poia prosefchi na po gi’ aftous, pou me ponoun
Na mou paroune to throno kapoioi prospathisane
En’ asteri eicha mono kai to apaitisane
To poso antexa sto chrono agnoisane
Poia prosefchi ego na kano gia ta krimata tous
Poia prosefchi boro na po gia na sothoun
Stazo krasi gia na xeplyno t’ amartimata tous
Poia prosefchi na po gi’ aftous, pou me ponoun
Poia prosefchi ego na kano gia ta krimata tous
Poia prosefchi boro na po gia na sothoun
Stazo krasi gia na xeplyno t’ amartimata tous
Poia prosefchi na po gi’ aftous, pou me ponoun
